name: pridefully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are pleased and satisfied, because you or people connected with you have done or got something good : It is good to see people peacefully and pridefully asserting their identity. I spent several years on the board of the company and I look back on that time very pridefully. Synonym
proudly
disapproving in a way that shows you think you are better or more important than other people : Some say he was pridefully trying to take credit for something others had done. Before the race he had been boasting pridefully that no one could beat him.
